const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "my-index-000001",
  settings: {
    analysis: {
      analyzer: {
        en: {
          tokenizer: "standard",
          filter: ["my_shingle_filter"],
        },
      },
      filter: {
        my_shingle_filter: {
          type: "shingle",
          min_shingle_size: 2,
          max_shingle_size: 5,
          output_unigrams: false,
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
